name: @tagspaces/tagspaces-extension-ui
description: Extension ui library used by the TagSpaces extensions
author: TagSpaces Authors <contact@tagspaces.org>

scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run lib:cjs && npm run lib:esm
scripts.build-webpack: npm run clean && tsc && tsc -m es6 --outDir lib-esm && webpack --config webpack.config.js --mode production
scripts.build-dev: npm run clean && tsc && tsc -m es6 --outDir lib-esm && webpack --config webpack.config.js --mode development
scripts.npmpack: npm run build && npm pack && tar -xvf tagspaces-tagspaces-codemirror-2.1.6.tgz && npx shx cp -rL package/** ../../../tagspaces/node_modules/@tagspaces/tagspaces-codemirror && rimraf package
scripts.pkg-publish: npm run build && npm publish --access public
